summary: A clan of watermen capture a crew of sport fishermen who must then fight for their lives.
cast: Jason Mewes|Richard Riehle|Floyd Abel|Blakely Bunnell|Scott Davis|Joy Glass|Luke Guldan|Tara Heston|Tyler Johnson|Matt L. Lockhart|Joe Monds|Ashley Myers|Gordon Price|A.J. Roberts|Alex Michalos
title: The Watermen
